name: eTrigue
tagline: Marketing Automation for the Rest of Us
description:
eTrigue DemandCenter marketing automation was initially developed by one of Silicon Valley’s leading marketing and demand generation agencies.
Inspired by the difficulty of running demand generation programs for startups and for multinational clients within the constraints and limitations of cumbersome and feature-light applications, we developed the DemandCenter marketing automation. Our sales acceleration solutions fill the need for a better demand generation solution.
